attributes.action: Lower the legal voting age to 16 in both local and general elections, including referendums.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At the age of 16 income tax becomes applicable to wages, for this reason this age should also become the legal voting age. If young people must pay tax why should they not be permitted to choose who they pay this tax to? Without this we will continue to live in a land without true democracy and where the government continues to lack legitimacy.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
